title: Herbal Prescription and Supplements at Institute of Integrative Health Specialists in Houston, TX
description: Acupuncture is the practice of stimulating healing by inserting sterile needles into particular body parts, which can cause a natural endorphin release and a reduction in inflammation, decrease blood pressure, enhance circulation, relieve tension, and enhance sleep.
cleaned_text: We offer various medicinal herbs in pill, tincture, tea, topical, and foot soak form. In addition to taking into account any drugs you could be taking, we'll recommend the best formula based on your constitution and condition presentations. Since some herbal formulae have contraindications for specific disorders, it is imperative to obtain expert guidance before using them. Elevate your treatment with. Start taking care of your health today. We create each formulation using only the best components available to licensed medical professionals. Our advice is to take your health seriously and thus avoid purchasing your herbs online since you cannot be certain that they are genuine or made with reliable ingredients. Instead, we carry herbs, which are produced following current [Good Manufacturing Practice (cGMP)](https://www.fda.gov/drugs/pharmaceutical-quality-resources/facts-about-current-good-manufacturing-practices-cgmps) guidelines set by the World Health Organization and the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) (WHO).
